text: (napiye!) Niccayamaka evan inta kur'anin kattalaikalai um mitu vitittu irukkirano avan niccayamaka um'mai (makkavakiya) umatu illattil tirumpac certtu vaippan. Akave, (napiye!) Kuruviraka: Nerana valiyaik kontu vantavar yar? (Atai maruttup) pakirankamana valikettil iruppavar yar? Enpatai en iraivan nankarivan
